00041   template<class KeyType=Size>
00042   struct ModeHashFunction
00043   {
00044     static inline Size getHashValue(const KeyType& key)
00045     {
00046       return -1;
00047       
00048     }
00049     
00050   };
00051 
00052   template<>
00053   struct ModeHashFunction<Size>
00054   {
00055     static inline Size getHashValue(const Size& key)
00056     {
00057       return key;
00058     }
00059     
00060   };
00061 
00062   template<>
00063   struct ModeHashFunction<String>
00064   {
00065     static inline Size getHashValue(const String& key)
00066     {
00067       return izenelib::util::HashFunction<String>::convert_key(key)
00068         % izenelib::util::HashFunction<String>::PRIME;
00069     }
00070     
00071   };

00075 template<

00084   template<class> class HashFuncType = ModeHashFunction
00085   >
00086 class LinearHashTable

00098   {
00099     return false;
00100     
00101   }

00104   {
00105     return NULL;

00107   }

00136 template<
00137   class ValueType,
00138   class KeyType,
00139   int SEGMENT_SIZE ,
00140   int DIRECTORY_SIZE,
00141   int expandFctrPerc,
00142   int shrinkFctrPerc,
00143   class LockType,
00144   template<class> class HashFuncType 
00145   >
00146 class LinearHashTable<ValueType,KeyType, MemStorage,
00147                        SEGMENT_SIZE, DIRECTORY_SIZE,
00148                        expandFctrPerc, shrinkFctrPerc,
00149                        LockType,HashFuncType>
00150   : public AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType, LockType>
00151 {
00152 
00153   BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(expandFctrPerc>=1);
00154   BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(expandFctrPerc<=100);
00155   BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(shrinkFctrPerc>=1);
00156   BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(shrinkFctrPerc<=100);
00157   /*
00158    * @brief LHTElem is a wrapper class for ValueType and provide next elem
00159    * for List like behaviour within the LinearHashTable.
00160    */
00161   class LHTElem {
00162 
00163   friend class Segment;
00164 
00165   
00166   public:
00167     ValueType data_;
00168     KeyType key_;
00169     LHTElem* pNext_;
00170       
00171     
00172     LHTElem(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& data) :
00173       data_(data), pNext_(0), key_(key) {
00174     }
00175       
00176     LHTElem(const LHTElem& source) :
00177       data_(source.data_), pNext_(source.pNext_), key_(source.key_) {
00178     }
00179     
00180         
00181     LHTElem& operator=(const LHTElem& source) {
00182       if (this != &source) {
00183         data_= source.data_;
00184         pNext_ = source.next_;
00185         key_ = source.key_;
00186             
00187       }
00188       return *this;
00189     }
00190     
00191     ~LHTElem() {
00192     } // next items are deleted in the Segment class.
00193 
00194   friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& out, const LHTElem& ele)
00195     {
00196       out<<ele.key_<<":"<<ele.data_;
00197       return out;
00198     }
00199 
00200   };
00201       
00202   /*
00203    * @brief Segment is used to support dynamic growth/shrink property of
00204    * LinearHashTable class.
00205    */
00206 
00207   class Segment 
00208   {
00209   public:
00210       
00211     LHTElem *pSeg_[SEGMENT_SIZE];
00212     
00213     Segment() {
00214       for (int i = 0; i < SEGMENT_SIZE; i++)
00215         pSeg_[i] = NULL;
00216     }
00217 
00218     ~Segment() {
00219       for (int i = 0; i < SEGMENT_SIZE; i++) {
00220         if (pSeg_[i]) {
00221           LHTElem *curr = pSeg_[i];
00222           do {
00223             // delete all the LHTElem objects following its next link.
00224             LHTElem *next = curr->pNext_;
00225             //delete curr;
00226             curr = next;
00227           } while (curr);
00228         }
00229       }
00230     }
00231   };
00232 
00233 protected:
00234     
00235   Size next_; // next bucket to be split
00236   Size maxp_; // upper bound on next during this expansion
00237   Size keycount_; // number of records in the table
00238   Size currentsize_; // current number of buckets
00239   double minloadfctr_, maxloadfctr_; // lower and upper bound on the load factor
00240   Segment* pDirectory_[DIRECTORY_SIZE];
00241   LockType locker_; // for thread-safe
00242   boost::auto_alloc alloc_;
00243   
00247   Size hash(const KeyType& key) const
00248   {
00249     Size h, address;
00250 
00251     h = ModeHashFunction<KeyType>::getHashValue(key);
00252     address = h % maxp_;
00253     if (address < next_)
00254       address = h % (2*maxp_);
00255 
00256     return address;
00257   }
00258   
00259   int compare(const KeyType& a, const KeyType& b) const
00260   {
00261     return _compare(a,b, static_cast<boost::is_arithmetic<KeyType>*>(0));
00262   }
00263   int _compare(const KeyType& a, const KeyType& b, const boost::mpl::true_*) const
00264   {
00265     return a-b;
00266   }
00267 
00268   int _compare(const KeyType& a, const KeyType& b, const boost::mpl::false_*) const
00269   {
00270     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((KeyTypeConcept<KeyType>));
00271     return a.compare(b);
00272   }
00273   
00277   void expand_table()
00278   {
00279     Size newaddress, oldsegmentindex, newsegmentindex;
00280     Segment* oldsegment, *newsegment;
00281     LHTElem* current, *previous; // for scanning down the old chain
00282     LHTElem* lastofnew; // points to the last ValueType of the new chain
00283 
00284     // reached maximum size of address space? if so, just continue the chaining.
00285     if (maxp_ + next_ < DIRECTORY_SIZE * SEGMENT_SIZE) {
00286       // locate the bucket to be split
00287       oldsegment = pDirectory_[next_/SEGMENT_SIZE];
00288       oldsegmentindex = next_ % SEGMENT_SIZE;
00289 
00290       // Expand address space, if necessary create a new Segment<ValueType>
00291       newaddress = maxp_ + next_;
00292       newsegmentindex = newaddress % SEGMENT_SIZE;
00293       if (newsegmentindex == 0)
00294         pDirectory_[newaddress / SEGMENT_SIZE] = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, Segment);//new Segment();
00295       newsegment = pDirectory_[newaddress / SEGMENT_SIZE];
00296 
00297       // adjust the state variables
00298       next_++;
00299         
00300       if (next_ == maxp_) {
00301         maxp_ = 2 * maxp_;
00302         next_ = 0;
00303       }
00304 
00305       currentsize_++;
00306 
00307       // relocate records to the new bucket
00308       current = oldsegment->pSeg_[oldsegmentindex];
00309       previous = NULL;
00310       lastofnew = NULL;
00311       newsegment->pSeg_[newsegmentindex] = NULL;
00312 
00313       while (current != NULL) {
00314         if (hash(current->key_) == newaddress) {
00315           // attach it to the end of the new chain
00316           if (lastofnew == NULL)
00317             newsegment->pSeg_[newsegmentindex] = current;
00318           else
00319             lastofnew->pNext_ = current;
00320           if (previous == NULL)
00321             oldsegment->pSeg_[oldsegmentindex] = current->pNext_;
00322           else
00323             previous->pNext_ = current->pNext_;
00324           lastofnew = current;
00325           current = current->pNext_;
00326           lastofnew->pNext_ = NULL;
00327         } else {
00328           // leave it on the old chain
00329           previous = current;
00330           current = current->pNext_;
00331         }
00332       }
00333     }
00334   }
00335   
00339   void contract_table()
00340   {
00341     int oldsegmentindex, newsegmentindex;
00342     Segment *oldsegment, *newsegment;
00343     LHTElem *current, *previous; // for scanning down the new/current chain
00344 
00345     // Is the table contractable or has more than one segment
00346     if (currentsize_ > SEGMENT_SIZE) { // there is a bucket to shrink.
00347       // locate the bucket to free
00348       currentsize_--;
00349 
00350       oldsegment = pDirectory_[currentsize_/SEGMENT_SIZE];
00351       oldsegmentindex = currentsize_ % SEGMENT_SIZE;
00352 
00353       // adjust the state variables
00354       next_--;
00355         
00356       if (next_ < 0) {
00357         maxp_ = maxp_/2;
00358         next_ = maxp_ - 1;
00359       }
00360 
00361       newsegment = pDirectory_[next_/SEGMENT_SIZE];
00362       newsegmentindex = next_ % SEGMENT_SIZE;
00363 
00364       // relocate records to the new bucket
00365       current = newsegment->pSeg_[newsegmentindex];
00366 
00367       // sacn down the end of the current where the additonal records
00368       // will be attached to.
00369       previous = current;
00370       while (current != NULL) {
00371         previous = current;
00372         current = current->pNext_;
00373       }
00374       // attach the chain of records to the end of the new bucket
00375       if (previous) {
00376         previous->pNext_ = oldsegment->pSeg_[oldsegmentindex];
00377       } else
00378         newsegment->pSeg_[newsegmentindex] = oldsegment->pSeg_[oldsegmentindex];
00379 
00380       oldsegment->pSeg_[oldsegmentindex] = NULL;
00381 
00382       // if necessary delete the old Segment<ValueType>
00383       if (oldsegmentindex == 0) {
00384         //        delete pDirectory_[currentsize_/SEGMENT_SIZE];
00385         pDirectory_[currentsize_/SEGMENT_SIZE] = NULL;
00386       }
00387     }
00388   }
00389 
00390   
00391   void init()
00392   {
00393     //  USING_IZENE_LOG();
00394     
00395     next_= 0;
00396     maxp_ = SEGMENT_SIZE;
00397     keycount_ = 0;
00398     currentsize_ = SEGMENT_SIZE;
00399     
00400     pDirectory_[0] = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, Segment);//new Segment();
00401 
00402     for (int i = 1; i < DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++)
00403       pDirectory_[i] = NULL;
00404   }
00405 
00406 
00407   virtual bool insert(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data) 
00408   {
00409     return insert(LHTElem(data.key, data.value));
00410   }
00411   
00412   bool insert(const LHTElem& elem)
00413   {
00414     // first requests the write lock
00415         locker_.acquire_write_lock();
00416     if (maxloadfctr_ * currentsize_ <= keycount_)
00417       expand_table(); // due for expanding table
00418 
00419     const KeyType& key = elem.key_;
00420     Size address = hash(key);
00421     Segment* currentSegment = pDirectory_[address/SEGMENT_SIZE];
00422     int segIndex = address % SEGMENT_SIZE;
00423     LHTElem* e = currentSegment->pSeg_[segIndex]; // first on chain
00424     if (e == NULL)
00425       currentSegment->pSeg_[segIndex] = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, LHTElem)(elem);//new LHTElem(elem);
00426     else {
00427       while (e->pNext_ != NULL) {
00428         if (compare(e->key_, key)==0) {// duplicate data
00429           // release the write lock
00430           locker_.release_write_lock();
00431           return false;
00432         }
00433         e = e->pNext_; // go to the end of the chain
00434       }
00435       if (compare(e->key_, key)==0) {
00436         // release the write lock
00437         locker_.release_write_lock();
00438         return false;
00439       }
00440       e->pNext_ = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, LHTElem)(elem);//new LHTElem(elem);
00441     }
00442 
00443     keycount_++; // increment key count by one.
00444     // release the write lock
00445     locker_.release_write_lock();
00446     return true;
00447   }
00448

00451   typedef LinearHashTable<ValueType,KeyType, MemStorage,SEGMENT_SIZE, DIRECTORY_SIZE,
00452    expandFctrPerc, shrinkFctrPerc, LockType,HashFuncType>
00453   Self;
00454   
00458   LinearHashTable():minloadfctr_(shrinkFctrPerc/100.0),maxloadfctr_(expandFctrPerc/100.0)
00459   {
00460     init();
00461   }

00468   ~LinearHashTable()
00469   {
00470     for (int i = 0; i < DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00471       //delete pDirectory_[i];
00472       pDirectory_[i] = NULL;
00473     }
00474   }
00475   
00476 
00480   void release()
00481   {
00482     for (int i = 0; i < DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00483       //      delete pDirectory_[i];
00484       pDirectory_[i] = NULL;
00485     }
00486     init();
00487   }

00489 
00490   int num_items() const {
00491     return ((LinearHashTable*)this)->get_current_items();
00492   }
00493   
00494   int get_current_items() {
00495     locker_.acquire_read_lock();
00496     int currentItems = keycount_;
00497     locker_.unlock();
00498     return currentItems;
00499   }
00500   
00501   int num_buckets() const {
00502     return currentsize_;
00503   }
00504 
00505   virtual ValueType* find(const KeyType& key)
00506   {
00507     locker_.acquire_read_lock();
00508     int address = hash(key);
00509     LHTElem* elem =
00510       pDirectory_[address/SEGMENT_SIZE]->pSeg_[address % SEGMENT_SIZE]; // first on chain
00511     while (elem != NULL) {
00512       if (compare(key, elem->key_)==0) {// found!
00513         // release the read lock
00514         locker_.release_read_lock();
00515    
00516         //      IF_DLOG(compare(key, elem->key_)==0)<<"compare(key, elem->key_)==0";
00517            
00518         return &elem->data_;
00519       } else
00520         elem = elem->pNext_;
00521     }
00522     // release the read lock
00523     locker_.release_read_lock();
00524     // not found
00525     return NULL;
00526   }
00527   
00528   inline const ValueType* find(const KeyType& key) const {
00529     return (const ValueType*)((LinearHashTable *)this)->find(key);
00530   }

00533   virtual bool insert(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& data)
00534   {
00535     return insert(LHTElem(key, data));
00536     
00537   }

00539   virtual bool update(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data)
00540   {
00541     return update(data.key, data.value);
00542     
00543   }
00544 
00545   virtual bool update(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& data)
00546   {
00547     locker_.acquire_write_lock();
00548     bool r = false;
00549     
00550     int address = hash(key);
00551     LHTElem* elem =
00552       pDirectory_[address/SEGMENT_SIZE]->pSeg_[address % SEGMENT_SIZE]; // first on chain
00553     while (elem != NULL) {
00554       if (compare(key, elem->key_)==0) {// found!
00555         // release the read lock
00556         elem->data_ = data;
00557         r = true;
00558         
00559       } else
00560         elem = elem->pNext_;
00561     }
00562     // release the read lock
00563     locker_.release_write_lock();
00564     // not found
00565 
00566        
00567     return r;
00568     
00569   }
00570   
00578   virtual bool del(const KeyType& key)
00579   {
00580     // first requests the write lock
00581     locker_.acquire_write_lock();
00582     if (minloadfctr_ * currentsize_ > keycount_)
00583       contract_table();
00584 
00585     int address = hash(key);
00586     LHTElem* elem =
00587       pDirectory_[address/SEGMENT_SIZE]->pSeg_[address % SEGMENT_SIZE]; // first on chain
00588     LHTElem* prev = elem;
00589 
00590     while (elem != NULL) {
00591       if (compare(key, elem->key_)) { // found!
00592         if (prev == elem) //
00593           pDirectory_[address/SEGMENT_SIZE]->pSeg_[address % SEGMENT_SIZE]
00594             = prev->pNext_;
00595         else
00596           prev->pNext_ = elem->pNext_;
00597 
00598         elem = NULL;//delete elem;
00599         keycount_--;
00600         // release the write lock
00601         locker_.release_write_lock();
00602         return true;
00603       } else {
00604         prev = elem;
00605         elem = elem->pNext_;
00606       }
00607     }
00608     // release the write lock
00609     locker_.release_write_lock();
00610     // not found
00611     return false;
00612   }

00614 
00619   void display(std::ostream& stream) const
00620   {
00621     stream << "Member variables: " << std::endl;
00622     stream << "the number of buckets: " << currentsize_ << std::endl;
00623     stream << "the number of records: " << keycount_ << std::endl;
00624     stream << "max load factor: " << maxloadfctr_ << std::endl;
00625     stream << "min load factor: " << minloadfctr_ << std::endl;
00626     stream << "max p value: " << maxp_ << std::endl;
00627     stream << "current p value: " << next_ << std::endl;
00628 
00629     for (int i=0; i<DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00630         
00631       for (int j =0; j<SEGMENT_SIZE; j++) {
00632         if (i*SEGMENT_SIZE+j>=maxp_+SEGMENT_SIZE)
00633           return;
00634           
00635         stream<<END<<i*SEGMENT_SIZE+j<<":   ";
00636         if (!pDirectory_[i])
00637           continue;
00638         if (!pDirectory_[i]->pSeg_[j])
00639           continue;
00640         LHTElem* elem = pDirectory_[i]->pSeg_[j]; // first on chain
00641         while (elem != NULL) {
00642           stream<<"|"<<elem->key_<<":"<<elem->data_;
00643           elem = elem->pNext_;
00644         }
00645         stream<<END;
00646           
00647       }
00648     }
00649 
00650   }

00652 
00653   template<class Archive> void save(Archive & ar,
00654                                     const unsigned int version = 0) const {
00655     ar & keycount_;
00656       
00657     for (int i=0; i<DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00658       for (int j =0; j<SEGMENT_SIZE; j++) {
00659         if (!pDirectory_[i])
00660           continue;
00661         if (!pDirectory_[i]->pSeg_[j])
00662           continue;
00663         LHTElem* elem = pDirectory_[i]->pSeg_[j]; // first on chain
00664         while (elem != NULL) {
00665       
00666           ar & elem->key_;
00667           ar & elem->data_;
00668           elem = elem->pNext_;
00669         }
00670       }
00671     }
00672 
00673   }
00674 
00675   template<class Archive> void load(Archive & ar,
00676                                     const unsigned int version = 0) {
00677     int n;
00678     ar & n;
00679 
00680     for (int i =0; i<n; i++) {
00681       ValueType dat;
00682       KeyType key;
00683       ar & key;
00684       ar & dat;
00685       insert(key, dat);
00686     }
00687   }
00688   
00689   void copyTo(AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType, LockType>& am) const {
00690 
00691     int d = 0;
00692     for (int i=0; i<DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00693       for (int j =0; j<SEGMENT_SIZE; j++) {
00694         if (!pDirectory_[i])
00695           continue;
00696         if (!pDirectory_[i]->pSeg_[j])
00697           continue;
00698         LHTElem* elem = pDirectory_[i]->pSeg_[j]; // first on chain
00699         while (elem != NULL) {
00700           ++d;
00701           am.insert(elem->key_, elem->data_);
00702           elem = elem->pNext;
00703         }
00704       }
00705     }
00706   }
00707   
00708   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& strm) {
00709     display(strm);
00710     return strm;
00711   }
